Accelerators,

This month's newsletter has a collection of updates on our current studies, study selection, and committee activities, but the big news item is that we will soon have our first PSA election! The election will be for an open Associate Director position. Read more about nominating yourself or others, or volunteering as an election teller, here:

News from the Accelerator - February 2020 (https://psysciacc.org/news/2020-02-27_news-from-the-accelerator-february-2020.html)
